custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetListEntryAssetEntryRel INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON AssetListEntryAssetEntryRel.assetEntryId = AssetEntry.entryId WHERE (AssetListEntryAssetEntryRel.assetListEntryId = ?) AND (AssetListEntryAssetEntryRel.segmentsEntryId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.visible = 1)
